channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Campus Summer Shuttle Service to Continue for City Station Residents
item.description: The Office of Parking and Transportation will be continuing shuttle service to Rensselaer students living at the City Station residences for the summer, with shuttle service to run from 10AM to 10PM Monday through Saturday, and from noon to 8PM on Sunday. The City Station shuttle bus stop is located in front of City Station East.
item.author: Students

item.title: ARCH 2024 Post-Summer Semester Feedback Survey Now Available
item.description: As the Arch semester ends, the Arch leadership team would like to know about your experience this summer, so please take a few minutes to share feedback about the Arch summer semester by completing the survey sent to your email. You have a very important role to play in our efforts to continuously improve the Arch summer semester experience!
item.author: Students

item.title: From Multimedia Services: New MyMediasite Video Editor Now Available
item.description: Multimedia Services would like to inform the Rensselaer community that the MyMediasite multimedia video system now has a new video editor with increased functionality that is immediately available to everyone with access to MyMediaite for recorded and uploaded videos. Please see the ITSSC article, “Editing Video in MyMediasite,” for more information.
item.author: Community

item.title: Mediasite Capture Offers In-Browser Video Recording, Sharing and Streaming
item.description: Multimedia Services is thrilled to announce that recording video via Mediasite Capture, a browser-based recorder which can be used to record camera and/or shared desktop as well as audio on any PC or Mac without the installation of a specialized client, is available to all users of the MyMediasite platform.
item.author: Community

item.title: Fidelity to Offer Confidential In-Person Retirement Consultation Sessions August 19
item.description: Date: Monday, August 19, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to help you become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Session to Review Single Course Enrollment Options
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 13, 2024 3:00 PM - 3:30 PM - During this session, Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., will review the online graduate programs for working professionals and provide course enrollment options to make an immediate impact on one’s work. Participants can also explore courses for developing valuable skills that benefit employee and employer alike. Please register if you plan to attend.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: CCPD to Hold URP/Handshake Faculty Training Session
item.description: On Friday, August 16, from 9:30AM to 11:00AM in DCC 209, CCPD will host an interactive opportunity for faculty members to learn how to use Handshake for posting undergraduate research positions. Participants will learn about Handshake, set up an employer profile, and prepare to post their first job. Light snacks will be provided. Space is limited, so interested faculty should register as soon as possible.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: HelioCampus Syllabus Assistance Available in August
item.description:
HelioCampus syllabus assistance is available during in-person office hours with Amy Svirsky, Learning Assessment Specialist, on the following dates: August 15, 10:00-12:00, Sage 2313 (basement across from the vending machines) August 22, 10:00-12:00, Fishbach Room, Library August 26, 2:00-3:30, Fishbach Room, Library
